name: jeu concours les 2Alpes
description:
A game develop as if we were engaged by Les 2Alpes (a ski station) to make a game were participant may win a prize.

In the game you are a paraglider, you goal is to go the farthest you can, dodging balloons and meteor and taking rising  air current to stay up as much as you can.

In this game i worked as a Game Designer and as a developer.

This was made using Unity.
